short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minute is a web application that enables anyone who has meetings to collaborate, share, and manage their meetings in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minute is a web application that enables anyone who has meetings to collaborate, share, and manage their meetings in real-time. Minute lets you bring all your meeting documents to a central place and share them easily.

Features:

● Prepare meetings and invite attendees.
● Collaborate on meeting minutes, to-do lists and other documents in the cloud in real time.
● Facilitates real-time co-creation of meeting notes and document sharing.
● Notifies all meeting participants when tasks are completed.

Minute is the complete app for preparing, sharing and running successful  and productive meetings. You can run any meeting anywhere, any time in your browser and everyone works on the same materials at the same time!

Signing up is a snap, since Minute integrates with all the popular social networks. Not ready for an account? Try Minute anonymous and signup later. 

Minute is free to download and gives you the opportunity to use all our features, but for a maximum of five meetings per month. If you need more than that, you can purchase a subscription from the app.


You can review our terms of use on our website: http://support.getminute.com/customer/portal/articles/1334314-minute-terms-of-use

You can review our privacy policy on our website:
http://support.getminute.com/customer/portal/articles/1334315-minute-privacy-policy

We would appreciate your feedback in helping us make the app the best that it can be. Drop us a line with your thoughts at support@getminute.com.
